body_html:
Natalia, this is great but there's two files now polluting the root dir.
Just having Dockerfile in the root dir seems okay and standard, can we move Dockerfile_v6 somewhere else, maybe tools/docker ?

body:
Natalia, this is great but there's two files now polluting the root dir.
Just having Dockerfile in the root dir seems okay and standard, can we move Dockerfile_v6 somewhere else, maybe tools/docker ?
